DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy lavage 70 % alcohol plus 0.5 % chlorhexidine versus 70 % alcohol surgical treatment ingrown toenail .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Lavage With Alcohol - Chlorhexidine Chemical Matricectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare efficacy lavage 70 % alcohol plus 0.5 % chlorhexidine versus 70 % alcohol phenolization procedure surgical treatment ingrown toenail patient undergo chemical matricectomy .
DOC.criteria: Older 18 onychocryptosis infection , history tinea pedis , onychomycosis , paronychia , nail trauma subungual hematoma , nail deformity disorder , peripheral vascular disease diabetes , cardiac disease , history rheumatic fever , recent antibiotic use current antimicrobial therapy , history steroid use recent nail polish use
